title: Automotive IoT Platform
subtitle: Fix vehicle telemetry and predictive maintenance
description: Connected vehicle platform needs telemetry pipeline and maintenance predictions
scenario: AutoConnect's predictive maintenance system crashed this morning. Fleet managers can't see vehicle health dashboards. Service centers are operating blind. The IoT engineer left broken timestamp parsing, incomplete anomaly detection, and empty predictive maintenance tables.
situation:
The pipeline has three issues:
1. Telemetry data has timestamp parsing errors (timezone issues)
2. Anomaly detection thresholds are hardcoded wrong
3. Predictive maintenance model integration is completely missing
objectives: Ingest telemetry with proper UTC timestamp conversion
Detect anomalies in engine temp, oil pressure, battery voltage
Generate maintenance alerts for critical vehicles
Pass all vehicle health validation checks

validations.description: Verify telemetry table has data with valid timestamps
validations.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM {catalog}.{schema_prefix}_bronze.vehicle_telemetry WHERE timestamp IS NOT NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM {catalog}.{schema_prefix}_gold.predictive_maintenance WHERE days_to_service > 0

hintsNote: No SQL hints are provided in the notebooks. You must identify the issues and implement fixes using the briefing context and notebook error descriptions only.
